title: Resolving broken store issue
body: Store doesn't load playing on mac. Will it resolve this issue if I play on PC instead?

replies.body: There may be an issue with your settings that is causing problem loading the store.  I recommend going over the [store issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-#section-mac) guide to troubleshoot this.  Make sure that Mac is selected for steps specific to your OS.  Let me know if your issue persists afterward and we can take another look.
